com.apriori.apt.testing

Interface CompilationContext.TaskBuilder

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CompilationContext.TaskBuilderWithProcessor
    Enclosing class:
    CompilationContext

    public static interface CompilationContext.TaskBuilder
    Builds a task to run in this compilation context. Running a task involves invoking the compiler and in turn running a task from within the annotation processing phase.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CompilationContext.TaskBuilder processingClasses(Class<?>... classes)
      Adds classes to be processed by the annotation processing round of compilation.

      Adds classes to be processed by the annotation processing round of compilation.
      CompilationContext.TaskBuilder processingFiles(Iterable<JavaFileObject> files)
      Adds files to the list of things to process during compilation.
      CompilationContext.TaskBuilder processingFiles(JavaFileObject... files)
      Adds files to the list of things to process during compilation.
      <T,X extends Throwable>
      T      		 run(CheckedProcessingTask<T,X> task)
      Invokes the compiler and runs the specified task during the annotation processing phase.

      Invokes the compiler and runs the specified task during the annotation processing phase.

    • Method Detail

      • withOptions

        CompilationContext.TaskBuilder withOptions(Iterable<String> options)
        Adds option strings to pass to the compiler.

      • withOptions

        CompilationContext.TaskBuilder withOptions(String... options)
        Adds option strings to pass to the compiler.

      • processingClasses

        CompilationContext.TaskBuilder processingClasses(Iterable<Class<?>> classes)
        Adds classes to be processed by the annotation processing round of compilation. Note that the classes and their annotations will be available for processing but will not be included in the first round's "root elements" since that indicates source elements to be processed. So you probably instead want processingFiles(Iterable).

      • processingClasses

        CompilationContext.TaskBuilder processingClasses(Class<?>... classes)
        Adds classes to be processed by the annotation processing round of compilation.
        See Also:
        processingClasses(Iterable)

      • processingFiles

        CompilationContext.TaskBuilder processingFiles(Iterable<JavaFileObject> files)
        Adds files to the list of things to process during compilation.

      • processingFiles

        CompilationContext.TaskBuilder processingFiles(JavaFileObject... files)
        Adds files to the list of things to process during compilation.

      • withProcessor

        CompilationContext.TaskBuilderWithProcessor withProcessor(Processor processor)
        Sets the processor under test for the task. The task can either run the processor or can interact with it from a processing task.

      • run

        <T,X extends Throwable> T run(CheckedProcessingTask<T,X> task)
                       throws X extends Throwable
        Invokes the compiler and runs the specified task during the annotation processing phase.
        Returns:
        the value returned by the specified task
        Throws:
        X extends Throwable

      • runReentrant

        <T,X extends Throwable> T runReentrant(CheckedProcessingTask<T,X> task)
                                throws X extends Throwable
        Invokes the compiler and runs the specified task during the annotation processing phase. If there is more than one round of processing, the task will be invoked each time.
        Returns:
        the value returned by final invocation of the specified task
        Throws:
        X extends Throwable
